Name: Olympic Basketball
About the game: Dribble, slam, dunk, score and win the Olympics! Show you skills, moves and fakes in this fast-paced authentic Basketball game. On defense, steal ball from your opponents and on attack, score 2 or 3 points shoots or dunk. Main features: - Single Match with Top AI game - Tournament games - Local 2 players games - Full 3D - Realistics animations - Real Basketball stadiums ambient sounds How to Play: - Keyboard arrow keys, or Gamepad Joystick to Move Player - Left Ctrl or Left Alt, Gamepad A Button to Pass Ball and Steal Ball - Space, Gamepad B Button to Shoot and Dunk Time to enter competition!
